name: Nami Frame Futures
description: Nami Frame Futures is a product that integrates the trading of perpetual futures with digital asset storage platforms, offering a wide range of supported contracts and leveraging up to x125 across more than 1000 trading pairs with tokens such as VNST, USDT, etc., across multiple platforms from Web2 to Web3, mobile applications, or websites. Nami Frame Futures token (NAO) is the central token of Nami Frame Futures project, distributed through a fair-launch mechanism and features a unique governance model. Key utilities of the NAO token include: - Holding NAO to share in the profits from NAO Futures trading fees based on ownership percentage in the Governance Pool. - Holding NAO to participate in voting for changes proposed by the project. - Using NAO for fees to receive up to a 40% reduction in trading fees.
